content.rendered:
With our independent yet collaborative approach, we endeavour to deliver the most effective software testing services within the stipulated time and budget. At TestingXperts(Tx), we offer unparalleled client satisfaction through our comprehensive suite of functional along with manual, cloud and security testing to name a few. We are proud to mention that we have successfully delivered more than 400 projects and counting.

Since quality has always been our utmost priority, we at TestingXperts, place a stringent emphasis on data protection with timely security audits. All of this wouldn’t have been possible without our experienced team of industry professionals, which includes senior leadership from top-notch MNCs across the globe.

We have made huge investments in training and certification on the latest technologies. Besides, the company has a global presence throughout nations like the USA, Canada, UK, Netherlands, India and Australia, along with successful partnerships with industry giants like Microsoft, SmartBear, QuerySurge, and Perfecto Mobile.
